    • Method Detail

      • newUser

        public boolean newUser(java.lang.String email,
                       java.lang.String password,
                       java.lang.String passwordConfirmation)
        Calls the DataAccess createUser() function and verifies if the creation of a new user was successful. Called if the user clicks on "Sign Up" in the sign in or sign up page.
        Parameters:
        email - the email provided by the user.
        password - the password provided by the user.
        passwordConfirmation - the password confirmation provided by the user.
        Returns:
        True if user was created successfully. False otherwise.

      • authenticateUser

        public boolean authenticateUser(java.lang.String email,
                                java.lang.String password)
        Verifies the user's authenticity by checking if passwords match and email is on the database. Called when the user clicks on "Sign In" in the sign in or sign up page.
        Parameters:
        email - the email provided by the user.
        password - the password provided by the user.
        Returns:
        True if user exists and has provided the correct password. False otherwise.

      • getUserByEmail

        public User getUserByEmail(java.lang.String email,
                           boolean login)
        Calls the DataAccess getUserByEmail() function to retrieve an instance of User from the database.
        Parameters:
        email - the email of the user.
        login - will be True if the user is logging in. False otherwise.
        Returns:
        the user.

      • userAddSet

        public boolean userAddSet(java.lang.String email,
                          java.lang.String key,
                          java.lang.String value)
        Calls the DataAccess userAddSet() function to add a Key/Value pair associated with the user to the database.
        Parameters:
        email - the email of the user.
        key - The Key of the Key/Value pair.
        value - The Value of the Key/Value pair.
        Returns:
        true if the operation was completed successfully, false otherwise.

      • userRemoveSet

        public boolean userRemoveSet(java.lang.String email,
                             java.lang.String key,
                             java.lang.String value)
        Calls the DataAccess userRemoveSet() function to delete one of the user"s Key/Value pair from the database.
        Parameters:
        email - the email of the user.
        key - The Key of the Key/Value pair.
        value - The Value of the Key/Value pair.
        Returns:
        true if the operation was completed successfully, false otherwise.

      • deleteUser

        public void deleteUser(java.lang.String email)
        Calls the DataAccess deleteUser() function to delete a user from the database.
        Parameters:
        email - the email of the user who will be removed.
